title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples to score the response.

The first point is earned for either h ′ (x)= f ′ (g(x))⋅ g ′ (x) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@489B@ or h ′ (7)= f ′ (g(7))⋅ g ′ (7). MathType@MTEF@5@5@@48A8@

If the first point is earned, the second point is earned only for an answer of 12 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaqaaaaaaaaaWdbiaaigdacaaIYaaaaa@3A92@ (or equivalent).

If the first point is not earned, the second point can be earned only for a response of either f ′ (0)⋅8=12 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@41AE@ or 3 2 ⋅8. MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3E63@

A response of 12 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaqaaaaaaaaaWdbiaaigdacaaIYaaaaa@3A92@ with no supporting work does not earn either point.
descriptions: The student response does not accurately include any of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes one of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes both of the criteria below.

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples to score the response.

The first point is earned for either k ″ (x)=2f(x)⋅ f ′ (x)⋅g(x)+ (f(x)) 2 ⋅ g ′ (x) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@58CA@ or k ″ (4)=2f(4)⋅ f ′ (4)⋅g(4)+ (f(4)) 2 ⋅ g ′ (4). MathType@MTEF@5@5@@5802@

The first point is also earned by any of the following incorrect expressions, each of which has a single error in the application of the product rule or the chain rule:

  • 2f(x)⋅g(x)+ (f(x)) 2 ⋅ g ′ (x) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4EBB@ or 2f(4)⋅g(4)+ (f(4)) 2 ⋅ g ′ (4) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4DBF@

  • 2 f ′ (x)⋅g(x)+ (f(x)) 2 ⋅ g ′ (x) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4EC6@ or 2 f ′ (4)⋅g(4)+ (f(4)) 2 ⋅ g ′ (4) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4DCA@

  • f ′ (x)⋅g(x)+ (f(x)) 2 ⋅ g ′ (x) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4E0A@ or f ′ (4)⋅g(4)+ (f(4)) 2 ⋅ g ′ (4) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4D0E@

  • 2f(x)⋅ f ′ (x)⋅ g ′ (x) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4875@ or 2f(4)⋅ f ′ (4)⋅ g ′ (4) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@47B8@

  • Note: A response that presents one of these expressions cannot earn the second point.

To earn the second point a response must correctly find k ″ (4)=− 40 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@410C@ (or equivalent) with supporting work.

The third point is earned for an answer and reason that are consistent with any declared nonzero value of k ″ (4). MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3CC2@
descriptions: The student response does not accurately include any of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes one of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes two of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes all three of the criteria below.

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples to score the response.

The point is earned only for an answer of 37 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaqaaaaaaaaaWdbiaaiodacaaI3aaaaa@3A99@ (or equivalent) with supporting work equivalent to 5⋅8+(f(2)−f(0)), MathType@MTEF@5@5@@46CB@ 40+(f(2)−f(0)), MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4449@ 5⋅8+(7−10), MathType@MTEF@5@5@@42F4@ 40+(7−10). MathType@MTEF@5@5@@40A3@

An answer of 37 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaqaaaaaaaaaWdbiaaiodacaaI3aaaaa@3A99@ with no supporting work does not earn the point.

title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples to score the response.

The first point is earned for considering m ′ (x), MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3D00@ m ′ (2), MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3CBF@ or m ′ . MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaceWGTbGbauaacaGGUaaaaa@3AAC@ This consideration may appear in a justification statement.

The second point is earned for m ′ (2)=15⋅ 2 2 + f ′ (2), MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4726@ m ′ (2)=60+ f ′ (2), MathType@MTEF@5@5@@432D@ or m ′ (2)=60−8 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@403E@ but is not earned for an unsupported response of m ′ (2)=52. MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3F42@

The third point is earned for an answer and justification consistent with any declared value of m ′ (2). MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3CC1@
